configuration.code: async function fn_6(inputs) {const{completion}=await starter.promptTemplate({template:"Is this question about math? Answer YES or NO.\nQuestion: {{question}}\nAnswer: ",question:inputs.question}).prompt.as("text").to(palm.generateText({PALM_KEY:starter.secrets({keys:["PALM_KEY"]}).PALM_KEY}));if(completion&&completion.startsWith("YES")){return math({question:inputs.question})}else{return search(inputs)}}
